org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph.astar

Interface Costs

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLengthCosts, DistanceCosts

    public interface Costs
    Costs used by the AStar algorithm to compute shortest paths.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double cost(Arc arc)
      Cost associated with the given arc.
      double heuristic(Node current, Node target)
      Estimation of the cost from current node to target.
